title: DDFP in Nashville!
itunes:title: DDFP in Nashville!
description:
Dave Dameshek is in Nashville and is joined by a quartet of top guests! First up, we have former NFL offensive lineman Ross Tucker (0:40) to discuss his draft week experience and going from the Ivy League to the NFL. Then, Hall of Fame Quarterback Kurt Warner joins Dave (26:50) to break down if he is in the top 12 QB during the Super Bowl Era. Steve Mariucci follows in the Music City (45:30) and talks about what made Steve Young so special and why he would fit in today’s NFL game. To close, Shek welcomes Stanford head coach David Shaw (1:05:15) to give his many reasons why he remains in Palo Alto.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
